ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Anyone there?
ygData.msgSnippet: Blind will not stop it from attacking you in my experience  Using Sunbeam with my druid, I have had some experience with the Blind spell. What I
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
Blind will not stop it from attacking you in my experience
</snip>
Using Sunbeam with my druid, I have had some experience with the Blind
spell. What I can tell you is that if you are within melee agro range, the
MoB will come after you. However, if you Tash, Stun, Blind and back out of
agro range it will wander around "aimlessly". DD, DoT, enter agro to lead it
away from more help, etc. I do not have much experience with the Enchanter
side of the house, so I was wondering if an Enchanter can kill a mob with
this tactic alone (ie no pet).


<snip>
Whirl is a stun, Once pet hits or you land a DD WTYH will break.
</snip>
I was under the impression that when stunned, the MoB is stunned for the
duration no matter what you did to the mob (melee, DD, or DoT). I know when
my char gets stunned, it can't do squat until the "You are no longer
stunned!" message appears.
Or am I wrong here and the dogs, er gods, of Norrath don't treat this the
same for MoBs and Characters?

<snip>
As you get higher in level you will want to use Charm OVER having a pet,
this will allow you to take out TWO or more mobs with less mana. Remember to
refresh your charm if you have an extended battle.
</snip>
Is this suggestion because of the mana drain from the Charm spell? I know a
MoB will hit for alot more than a Pet. The idea of a pet at 24 that hits in
the 50s is very appealing. What does an animation hit for at 24th?


Thicken Mana revisited:
After you create a Vial-O-Mana, can you right click on it to regain that
mana? Or is it's only purpose for the Wu Gauntlets at this time?

I am used to soloing with my Druid. Is there anyone that has soloed to
50th?Stupid people are very common so I try to avoid them as much as
possible. Low levels are bad enough, but to lose xp because of other's
stupidity is more than frustrating. If I die because of something I do, then
I learn and go on. Anyway, solo sugestions and experiences are very welcome.


Thanks again.


--
Arakine
